peril.views.slick.states.gameStates

Class SlickSetup

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public final class SlickSetup
extends CoreGameState
    Displays the Setup state to the user.
    Since:
    2018-03-15
    Version:
    1.01.02
    Author:
    Joshua_Eddy, Joseph_Rolli, Gurdeep_Pol
    See Also:
    CoreGameState, Setup, SlickSetup.RulerSelector

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private class  SlickSetup.RulerSelector
      This displays the SlickPlayers that are currently in the game to the user so that they may be clicked in order to change the ruler of the selected SlickCountry to that of the clicked SlickPlayer.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private SlickSetup.RulerSelector players
      The SlickSetup.RulerSelector that displays the SlickPlayers that the user may select to rule the currently selected SlickCountry.
